SELECT je.*, jo.org_name AS departmentName, jbs.name AS booksSetName FROM jbx_employee je INNER JOIN jbx_organizations jo ON je.department_id = jo.id AND jo.deleted = 'n' and jo.book_id = #{Dto.bookId}
AND jo.code_path LIKE CONCAT('%', #{Dto.departmentId}, '%')
INNER JOIN jbx_book jbs ON je.book_id = jbs.id AND jbs.deleted = 'n' and jbs.id = #{Dto.bookId} WHERE je.deleted = 'n'
AND je.display_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{Dto.displayName}, '%')
AND je.employee_number LIKE CONCAT('%', #{Dto.employeeNumber}, '%')
